root.message: The STAT_CONC_DEF field for indicator 4-6-1, translated into en
root.data: Literacy rate of population aged 15 years and over is the percentage of population aged 15 years and over at time (t) who is literate (can read, write and understand a simple sentence in the national language script, ethnic or foreign characters) compared to the total population aged 15 years and over at that time.
